issues.description:
In the function `fallback` the following predictable state variables are used to determine Ether recipient:
- block.timestamp
- block.number
issues.title: Dependence on predictable environment variable

issues.description: In the function `fallback` predictable expression 'block.blockhash(block.number - some_storage_var)' is used to determine Ether recipient
issues.title: Dependence on predictable variable

issues.description: The return value of an external call is not checked. Note that execution continue even if the called contract throws.
issues.title: Unchecked CALL return value
